document.full_text: under pressure from medical researchers, owners and even players, the general managers are expected to strengthen rule 48, the league's bylaw governing checks to the head, at their meeting that begins monday.
document.title: general managers likely to address hits to head
lines_and_colors: under pressure from medical researchers, owners and even players, the general managers are expected to strengthen rule 48, the league's bylaw governing checks to the head, at their meeting that begins monday.
